    1. IntersectionConfigDialog(String, long, long)

Class IntersectionConfigDialog

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.control.Dialog<Map<String,Long>>
com.simulus.view.intersection.IntersectionConfigDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class IntersectionConfigDialog extends javafx.scene.control.Dialog<Map<String,Long>>
This is the configuration dialog for intersections. It provides sliders to change the duration of the phases of the light-pairs on intersections.
